extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite     (Level 4 and registered in a COGS Specialization Plan) and (an overall GPA of 1.90) and (a GPA of 2.60 in 30.0 units in CISC) and (a GPA of 2.60 in COGS) and COGS300.

basic.description: Topic selected under the supervision of a member of one of the faculties of CISC, LING, PHIL, PSYC. Emphasis may be on experimental, theoretical, or computer implementation topics. Independent research, an oral presentation, and a written report are required.
basic.subject: COGS
basic.title: Advanced Undergraduate Project
